geometry::strategy::distance::ellipsoid

geometry::strategy::distance::ellipsoid Class Reference

Defines ellipsoid values for use in distance calculations. More...

Detailed Description

Defines ellipsoid values for use in distance calculations.

They have a constructor with the earth radius

Template parameters:
  • P1 first point type
  • P2 optional second point type
Note:
Might be moved to separated projection:: namespace, or elsewhere
